Class VectorFactory

java.lang.Object

Class for building vectors, designed to be used externally.

dwiddows

Method Detail

createZeroVector

public static Vector createZeroVector(VectorType type,

createZeroVector

public static Vector createZeroVector(java.lang.String type,
                                      int dimension)
Can be called by external methods that don't explicitly use VectorType enums. This design may be flawed, but it's easy to fix if need be.

Parameters:
type - must be one of "binary", "real", "complex".
Returns:
new vector of the appropriate type and dimension.

generateRandomVector

public static Vector generateRandomVector(VectorType type,
                                          int dimension,
                                          int numEntries,
                                          java.util.Random random)
Generates an appropriate random vector.

Parameters:
type - one of the recognized vector types
dimension - number of dimensions in the generated vector
numEntries - total number of non-zero entries; must be no greater than half of dimension
random - random number generator; passed in to enable deterministic testing
Returns:
vector generated with appropriate type, dimension and number of nonzero entries

getLuceneByteSize

public static int getLuceneByteSize(VectorType vectorType,
                                    int dimension)
